lead_paragraph: HOURIGAN--Sanford Peter, peacefully passed away at age 86 on Monday, June 6, 2016 in New York, NY. After attending school in Albany, NY, Sanford played minor league baseball and then joined the US Navy during the Korean War. For decades, he lived and worked in Manhattan and could frequently be seen at The Boat House in Central Park overlooking the lake. He is survived by his son, Timothy P. Hourigan, his daughter Keana P. (Hourigan) Anna, with three grandchildren and his brother, John Hourigan and sister, Patricia Cain and eight nieces and nephews. A memorial service will be held on June 16, 2016, 4:00-6:00, at John Krtil Funeral Home, 1297 First Ave., New York, NY. In lieu of flowers, please keep a Veteran in your thoughts. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HOURIGAN, SANFORD PETER
